titles.title: Western Tribal Water Infrastructure Act of 2020
Western Tribal Water Infrastructure Act of 2019
Western Tribal Water Infrastructure Act of 2020
Western Tribal Water Infrastructure Act of 2020
Western Tribal Water Infrastructure Act of 2019
Western Tribal Water Infrastructure Act of 2019
A bill to amend the American's Water Infrastructure Act of 2018 to expand the Indian reservation drinking water program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Hoeven with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 116-309.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 609.
